entry.dcterms:description: the economic situation in Hungary; satisfaction and political atmosphere; the respondent's own standard of living, and general knowledge about national and workplace issues

cross-section
Drawn from 50 factories belonging to 13 different sectors of industry: about 55% Trade Union functionaries; 45% managers or white collar workers.
